short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official Cometin Desktop extension that allows your PC to retrieve information from Cometin Cloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is Cometin Desktop - Chrome extension
Cometin Desktop is responsible for the managing and retrieving data from Cometin Cloud. Please see all the information on https://app.cometin.stjin.host

Please read the privacy policy at: https://cometin.stjin.host/privacypolicy/privacy_policy.html
